author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I teach you how to create a custom bootable Linux ISO with cubic. This program lets you modify any Debian/Ubuntu ISO with your own software, settings, and configurations. Everything you customize with cubic will be availble when you boot into the live .ISO so this process is great for creating a "travel" Linux distro.

Link to cubic
https://github.com/PJ-Singh-001/Cubic

Link to B00merang Project
https://github.com/B00merang-Project/Windows-XP

My merch is available at
